articles.description: While Soul has predictable beats, its execution is near-perfect. It is not only visually stunning, but also engages and entertains whilst asking us heavy existential questions.
articles.content: What is your lifes mission? This is a simply-worded question that is so loaded. We often wonder about this, or are frequently asked about it by well-wishers. The purpose of life. Some find it, and so… [+2255 chars]
